description: image on darkened yellowed paper; male figure's head with mustache and short hair gazes downward; small pocks/ holes scattered across face with thinly drawn veins/ vessels creeping down the face; large hole in the scalp of figure, exposing a bumpy surface with more pocks/ holes and veins; block of hand written text on lower third of paper
inscription: URC, in pencil: JW 10E | W. J 13. 43.
provenance: The artist; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
title: Untitled (Self-portrait during the war)
